---
id: update-document-tags
title: "Update document tags"
description: "Updates multiple tags to a document; this endpoint also accepts a different body parameter for updating a single tag"
sidebar_label: "Update document tags"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "patch api-method"
info_path: docs/api-reference/formkiq-api-jwt
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update document tags"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/documents/{documentId}/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates multiple tags to a document; this endpoint also accepts a different body parameter for updating a single tag

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
